scene ii padua baptistaso house
enter baptista gremio tranio lucentio katherina bianca lucentio cambio attendants
baptista tranio signior lucentio pointed day katherine petruchio married yet hear soninlaw said mockery want bridegroom priest attends speak ceremonial rites marriage says lucentio shame katherina shame mine must forsooth forcd give hand opposd heart unto madbrain rudesby full spleen wood haste means wed leisure told frantic fool hiding bitter jests blunt behaviour noted merry man hell woo thousand point day marriage make friends invited proclaim banns yet never means wed hath wood must world point poor katherine say lo mad petruchios wife would please come marry tranio patience good katherine baptista upon life petruchio means well whatever fortune stays word though blunt know passing wise though merry yet withal hes honest katherina would katherine never seen though exit weeping followed bianca others baptista go girl blame thee weep injury would vex saint much shrew thy impatient humour
master master news old news never heard baptista new old may biondello news hear petruchios coming baptista come biondello sir baptista biondello coming baptista biondello stands sees tranio say thine old news biondello petruchio coming new hat old jerkin pair old breeches thrice turnd pair boots candlecases one buckled another lacd old rusty sword taen town armoury broken hilt chapeless two broken points horse hippd old motley saddle stirrups kindred besides possessd glanders like mose chine troubled lampass infected fashions full windgalls sped spavins rayed yellows past cure fives stark spoild staggers begnawn bots swayd back shouldershotten nearleggd halfcheekd bit headstall sheeps leather restrained keep stumbling hath often burst repaired knots one girth six times piecd womans crupper velure hath two letters name fairly set studs piecd packthread baptista comes biondello sir lackey world caparisond like horse linen stock one leg kersey boothose gartred red blue list old hat humour forty fancies prickd int feather monster monster apparel like christian footboy gentlemans lackey tranio tis odd humour pricks fashion yet oftentimes lie goes meanapparelld baptista glad hes come howsoeer comes biondello sir comes baptista didst thou say comes biondello petruchio came baptista ay petruchio came biondello sir say horse comes back baptista thats one biondello nay saint jamy hold penny horse man one yet many
petruchio come gallants whos home baptista welcome sir petruchio yet come well baptista yet halt tranio well apparelld wish petruchio better rush thus kate lovely bride father gentles methinks frown wherefore gaze goodly company saw wondrous monument comet unusual prodigy baptista sir know weddingday first sad fearing would come sadder come unprovided fie doff habit shame estate eyesore solemn festival tranio tell us occasion import hath long detaind wife sent hither unlike petruchio tedious tell harsh hear sufficeth come keep word though part enforced digress leisure excuse shall well satisfied withal kate stay long morning wears tis time church tranio see bride unreverent robes go chamber put clothes mine petruchio believe thus ill visit baptista thus trust marry petruchio good sooth even thus therefore ha done words shes married unto clothes could repair wear change poor accoutrements twere well kate better fool chat bid goodmorrow bride seal title lovely kiss exeunt petruchio petruchio tranio hath meaning mad attire persuade possible put better ere go church baptista ill see event exeunt baptista gremio biondello attendents tranio love concerneth us ad fathers liking bring pass imparted worship get man whateer skills much well fit turn shall vincentio pisa make assurance padua greater sums promised shall quietly enjoy hope marry sweet bianca consent lucentio fellow schoolmaster doth watch biancas steps narrowly twere good methinks steal marriage performd let world say ill keep mine despite world tranio degrees mean look watch vantage business well overreach greybeard gremio narrowprying father minola quaint musician amorous licio masters sake lucentio

enter petruchio katherina bianca baptista hortensio grumio train
petruchio gentlemen friends thank pains know think dine today prepard great store wedding cheer haste doth call hence therefore mean take leave baptista ist possible away tonight petruchio must away today night come make wonder knew business would entreat rather go stay honest company thank beheld give away patient sweet virtuous wife dine father drink health must hence farewell tranio let us entreat stay till dinner petruchio may gremio let entreat petruchio katherina let entreat petruchio content katherina content stay petruchio content shall entreat stay yet stay entreat katherina love stay petruchio grumio horse grumio ay sir ready oats eaten horses katherina nay thou canst go today tomorrow till please door open sir lies way may jogging whiles boots green ill gone till please tis like youll prove jolly surly groom take first roundly petruchio kate content thee prithee angry katherina angry hast thou father quiet shall stay leisure gremio ay marry sir begins work katherina gentlemen forward bridal dinner see woman may made fool spirit resist petruchio shall go forward kate thy command obey bride attend go feast revel domineer carouse full measure maidenhead mad merry go hang bonny kate must nay look big stamp stare fret master mine goods chattels house household stuff field barn horse ox ass thing stands touch whoever dare ill bring mine action proudest stops way padua grumio draw forth thy weapon beset thieves rescue thy mistress thou man fear sweet wench shall touch thee kate ill buckler thee million exeunt petruchio katherina grumio baptista nay let go couple quiet ones gremio went quickly die laughing tranio mad matches never like lucentio mistress whats opinion sister bianca mad shes madly mated gremio warrant petruchio kated baptista neighbours friends though bride bridegroom wants supply places table know wants junkets feast lucentio shall supply bridegrooms place let bianca take sisters room tranio shall sweet bianca practise bride baptista shall lucentio come gentlemen lets go exeunt

act iv scene petruchios country house
grumio fie fie tired jades mad masters foul ways ever man beaten ever man rayd ever man weary sent make fire coming warm little pot soon hot lips might freeze teeth tongue roof mouth heart belly ere come fire thaw blowing fire shall warm considering weather taller man take cold holla ho curtis
curtis calls coldly grumio piece ice thou doubt thou mayst slide shoulder heel greater run head neck fire good curtis curtis master wife coming grumio grumio ay curtis ay therefore fire fire cast water curtis hot shrew shes reported grumio good curtis frost thou knowst winter tames man woman beast hath tamd old master new mistress fellow curtis curtis away threeinch fool beast grumio three inches thy horn foot long least wilt thou make fire shall complain thee mistress whose hand hand thou shalt soon feel thy cold comfort slow thy hot office curtis prithee good grumio tell goes world grumio cold world curtis every office thine therefore fire thy duty thy duty master mistress almost frozen death curtis theres fire ready therefore good grumio news grumio jack boy ho boy much news thou wilt curtis come full conycatching grumio therefore fire caught extreme cold wheres cook supper ready house trimmd rushes strewd cobwebs swept servingmen new fustian white stockings every officer weddinggarment jacks fair within jills fair without carpets laid everything order curtis ready therefore pray thee news grumio first know horse tired master mistress falln curtis grumio saddles dirt thereby hangs tale curtis lets hat good grumio grumio lend thine ear curtis grumio striking curtis tis feel tale hear tale grumio therefore tis calld sensible tale cuff knock car beseech listning begin imprimis came foul hill master riding behind mistress curtis one horse grumio whats thee curtis horse grumio tell thou tale hadst thou crossd thou shouldst heard horse fell horse thou shouldst heard miry place bemoild left horse upon beat horse stumbled waded dirt pluck swore prayd never prayd cried horses ran away bridle burst lost crupper many things worthy memory shall die oblivion thou return unexperiencd thy grave curtis reckning shrew grumio ay thou proudest shall find comes home talk call forth nathaniel joseph nicholas philip walter sugarsop rest let heads sleekly combd blue coats brushd garters indifferent knit let curtsy left legs presume touch hair mastcrs horsetail till kiss hands ready curtis grumio call forth curtis hear ho must meet master countenance mistress grumio hath face curtis knows grumio thou seems calls company countenance curtis call forth credit grumio comes borrow nothing
enter four five servingmen
nathaniel welcome home grumio philip grumio joseph grumio nicholas fellow grumio nathaniel old lad grumio welcome fellow thus much greeting spruce companions ready things neat nathaniel things ready near master grumio een hand alighted therefore cocks passion silence hear master
petruchio knaves man door hold stirrup take horse nathaniel gregory philip servants sir sir petruchio sir sir sir sir loggerheaded unpolishd grooms attendance regard duty foolish knave sent grumio sir foolish petruchio peasant swain whoreson malthorse drudge bid thee meet park bring along rascal knaves thee grumio nathaniels coat sir fully made gabriels pumps unpinkd th heel link colour peters hat walters dagger come sheathing none fine adam ralph gregory rest ragged old beggarly yet come meet petruchio go rascals go fetch supper exeunt servingmen

wheres spaniel troilus sirrah get hence bid cousin ferdinand come hither exit servingman one kate must kiss acquainted slippers shall water come kate wash welcome heartily whoreson villain let fall strikes katherina patience pray twas fault unwilling petruchio whoreson beetleheaded flapeard knave come kate sit know stomach give thanks sweet kate else shall whats mutton first servant ay petruchio brought peter petruchio tis burnt meat dogs rascal cook durst villains bring dresser serve thus love take trenchers cups throws meat etc heedless joltheads unmannerd slaves grumble ill straight exeunt servants katherina pray husband disquiet meat well contented petruchio tell thee kate twas burnt dried away expressly forbid touch engenders choler planteth anger better twere us fast since choleric feed overroasted flesh patient tomorrow shall mended night well fast company come bring thee thy bridal chamber exeunt

scene iii petruchios house
grumio forsooth dare life katherina wrong spite appears marry famish beggars come unto fathers door upon entreaty present alms elsewhere meet charity never knew entreat never needed entreat starvd meat giddy lack sleep oaths kept waking brawling fed spites wants name perfect love say sleep eat twere deadly sickness else present death prithee go get repast care wholesome food grumio say neats foot katherina tis passing good prithee let grumio fear choleric meat say fat tripe finely broild katherina like well good grumio fetch grumio tell fear tis choleric say piece beef mustard katherina dish love feed upon grumio ay mustard hot little katherina beef let mustard rest grumio nay shall mustard else get beef grumio katherina one anything thou wilt grumio mustard without beef katherina go get thee gone thou false deluding slave beats feedst name meat sorrow thee pack triumph thus upon misery go get thee gone say

petruchio fares kate sweeting amort hortensio mistress cheer katherina faith cold petruchio pluck thy spirits look cheerfully upon love thou seest diligent dress thy meat bring thee sure sweet kate kindness merits thanks word nay thou lovst pains sorted proof take away dish katherina pray let stand petruchio poorest service repaid thanks shall mine touch meat katherina thank sir hortensio signior petruchio fie blame come mistress kate ill bear company petruchio aside eat hortensio thou lovest much good unto thy gentle heart kate eat apace honey love return unto thy fathers house revel bravely best silken coats caps golden rings ruffs cuffs farthingales things scarfs fans double change bravry amber bracelets beads knavry hast thou dind tailor stays thy leisure deck thy body ruffling treasure
come tailor let us see ornaments lay forth gown
news sir haberdasher cap worship bespeak petruchio moulded porringer velvet dish fie fie tis lewd filthy tis cockle walnutshell knack toy trick babys cap away come let bigger katherina ill bigger doth none exit haberdasher petruchio thy gown ay come tailor let us seet mercy god masquing stuff whats sleeve tis like demicannon carvd like appletart heres snip nip cut slish slash like censer barbers shop devils name tailor callst thou hortensio aside see shes like neither cap gown tailor bid make orderly well according fashion time petruchio marry remembred bid mar time go hop every kennel home shall hop without custom sir ill none hence make best katherina never saw better fashiond gown quaint pleasing commendable belike mean make puppet petruchio true means make puppet thee tailor says worship means make puppet petruchio monstrous arrogance thou liest thou thread thou thimble thou yard threequarters halfyard quarter nail thou flea thou nit thou wintercricket thou bravd mine house skein thread away thou rag thou quantity thou remnant shall bemete thee thy yard thou shalt think prating whilst thou livst tell thee thou hast marrd gown tailor worship deceivd gown made master direction grumio gave order done grumio gave order gave stuff tailor desire made grumio marry sir needle thread tailor request cut grumio thou hast facd many things tailor grumio face thou hast bravd many men brave neither facd bravd say unto thee bid thy master cut gown bid cut pieces ergo thou liest tailor note fashion testify petruchio read grumio note lies ins throat say said tailor reads imprimis loosebodied gown grumio master ever said loosebodied gown sew skirts beat death bottom brown bread said gown petruchio proceed tailor reads small compassd cape grumio confess cape tailor reads trunk sleeve grumio confess two sleeves tailor reads sleeves curiously cut petruchio ay theres villainy grumio error th bill sir error th bill commanded sleeves cut sewd ill prove upon thee though thy little finger armed thimble tailor true say thee place thou shouldst know grumio thee straight take thou bill give thy meteyard spare hortensio godamercy grumio shall odds petruchio well sir brief gown grumio th right sir tis mistress petruchio go take unto thy masters use grumio villain thy life take mistress gown thy masters use petruchio sir whats conceit grumio sir conceit deeper think take mistress gown masters use fie fie fie petruchio aside hortensio say thou wilt see tailor paid go take hence gone say hortensio tailor ill pay thee thy gown tomorrow take unkindness hasty words away say commend thy master exit tailor petruchio well come kate unto fathers even honest mean habiliments purses shall proud garments poor tis mind makes body rich sun breaks darkest clouds honour peereth meanest habit jay precious lark feathers beautiful adder better eel painted skin contents eye good kate neither art thou worse poor furniture mean array thou accountst shame lay therefore frolic hence forthwith feast sport us thy fathers house go call men let us straight bring horses unto longlane end mount thither walk foot lets see think tis seven oclock well may come dinnertime katherina dare assure sir tis almost two twill suppertime ere come petruchio shall seven ere go horse look speak think still crossing sirs let alone go today ere shall oclock say hortensio gallant command sun exeunt

scene ii lucentios house
enter baptista vincentio gremio pedant lucentio bianca petruchio katherina hortensio widow servingmen tranio biondello grumio bringing banquet
lucentio last though long jarring notes agree time raging war done smile scapes perils overblown fair bianca bid father welcome selfsame kindness welcome thine brother petruchio sister katherina thou hortensio thy loving widow feast best welcome house banquet close stomachs great good cheer pray sit sit chat well eat sit petruchio nothing sit sit eat eat baptista padua affords kindness son petruchio petruchio padua affords nothing kind hortensio sakes would word true petruchio life hortensio fears widow widow never trust afeard petruchio sensible yet miss sense mean hortensio afeard widow giddy thinks world turns round petruchio roundly replied katherina mistress mean widow thus conceive petruchio conceives likes hortensio hortensio widow says thus conceives tale petruchio well mended kiss good widow katherina giddy thinks world turns round pray tell meant widow husband troubled shrew measures husbands sorrow woe know meaning katherina mean meaning widow right mean katherina mean indeed respecting petruchio kate hortensio widow petruchio hundred marks kate put hortensio thats office petruchio spoke like officer ha thee lad drinks hortensio baptista likes gremio quickwitted folks gremio believe sir butt together well bianca head butt hastywitted body would say head butt head horn vincentio ay mistress bride hath awakened bianca ay frighted therefore ill sleep petruchio nay shall since begun bitter jest two bianca bird mean shift bush pursue draw bow welcome exeunt bianca katherina widow petruchio hath prevented signior tranio bird aimd though hit therefore health shot missd tranio sir lucentio slippd like greyhound runs catches master petruchio good swift simile something currish tranio tis well sir hunted tis thought deer hold bay baptista petruchio tranio hits lucentio thank thee gird good tranio hortensio confess confess hath hit petruchio little galld confess jest glance away tis ten one maimd two outright baptista good sadness son petruchio think thou hast veriest shrew petruchio well say therefore assurance lets one send unto wife whose wife obedient come first doth send shall win wager propose hortensio content whats wager lucentio twenty crowns petruchio twenty crowns ill venture much hawk hound twenty times much upon wife lucentio hundred hortensio content petruchio match tis done hortensio shall begin lucentio go biondello bid mistress come biondello go exit baptista son ill half bianca comes lucentio ill halves ill bear
news biondello sir mistress sends word busy come petruchio shes busy come answer gremio ay kind one pray god sir wife send worse petruchio hope better hortensio sirrah biondello go entreat wife come forthwith exit biondello petruchio ho entreat nay must needs come hortensio afraid sir entreated
wheres wife biondello says goodly jest hand come bids come petruchio worse worse come vile intolerable endurd sirrah grumio go mistress say command come exit grumio hortensio know answer petruchio hortensio petruchio fouler fortune mine end
baptista holidame comes katherina katherina sir send petruchio sister hortensios wife katherina sit conferring parlour fire petruchio go fetch hither deny come swinge soundly forth unto husbands away say bring hither straight exit katherina lucentio wonder talk wonder hortensio wonder bodes petruchio marry peace bodes love quiet life awful rule right supremacy short thats sweet happy baptista fair befall thee good petruchio wager thou hast ad unto losses twenty thousand crowns another dowry another daughter changd never petruchio nay win wager better yet show sign obedience newbuilt virtue obedience
reenter katherina bianca widow
see comes brings froward wives prisoners womanly persuasion katherine cap becomes bauble throw underfoot katherina complies widow lord let never cause sigh till brought silly pass bianca fie foolish duty call lucentio would duty foolish wisdom duty fair bianca hath cost hundred crowns since suppertime bianca fool laying duty petruchio katherine charge thee tell headstrong women duty owe lords husbands widow come come youre mocking telling petruchio come say first begin widow shall petruchio say shall first begin katherina fie fie unknit threatening unkind brow dart scornful glances eyes wound thy lord thy king thy governor blots thy beauty frosts bite meads confounds thy fame whirlwinds shake fair buds sense meet amiable woman movd like fountain troubled muddy illseeming thick bereft beauty none dry thirsty deign sip touch one drop thy husband thy lord thy life thy keeper thy head thy sovereign one cares thee thy maintenance commits body painful labour sea land watch night storms day cold whilst thou liest warm home secure safe craves tribute thy hands love fair looks true obedience little payment great debt duty subject owes prince even woman oweth husband froward peevish sullen sour obedient honest foul contending rebel graceless traitor loving lord ashamd women simple offer war kneel peace seek rule supremacy sway bound serve love obey bodies soft weak smooth unapt toll trouble world soft conditions hearts well agree external parts come come froward unable worins mind hath big one heart great reason haply bandy word word frown frown see lances straws strength weak weakness past compare seeming indeed least vail stomachs boot place hands husbands foot token duty please hand ready may ease petruchio theres wench come kiss kate lucentio well go thy ways old lad thou shalt hat vincentio tis good hearing children toward lucentio harsh hearing women froward petruchio come kate well bed three married two sped lucentio twas wager though hit white winner god give good night exeunt petruchio katherina hortensio go thy ways thou hast tamd curst shrow lucentio tis wonder leave tamd exeunt

scene ship sea afterwards uninhabited island
tempest act scene 1
ship sea tempestuous noise thunder lightning heard
enter shipmaster boatswain
master boatswain boatswain master cheer master good speak th mariners fall tot yarely run aground bestir bestir exit
boatswain heigh hearts cheerly cheerly hearts yare yare take topsail tend th masters whistle blow till thou burst thy wind room enough
alonso good boatswain care wheres master play men boatswain pray keep antonio master boson boatswain hear mar labour keep cabins assist storm gonzalo nay good patient boatswain sea hence cares roarers name king cabin silence trouble us gonzalo good yet remember thou hast aboard boatswain none love counsellor command elements silence work peace present hand rope use authority give thanks livd long make ready cabin mischance hour hapcheerly good heartsout way say exit gonzalo great comfort fellow methinks hath drowning mark upon complexion perfect gallows stand fast good fate hanging make rope destiny cable doth little advantage born hangd case miserable exeunt
boatswain topmast yare lower lower bring try wi th maincourse cry within plague upon howling louder weather office
yet shall give oer drown mind sink sebastian pox throat bawling blasphemous incharitable dog boatswain work antonio hang cur hang whoreson insolent noisemaker less afraid drownd thou art gonzalo ill warrant drowning though ship stronger nutshell leaky unstanched wench boatswain lay ahold ahold set two courses sea lay
enter mariners wet mariners lost prayers prayers lost exeunt boatswain must mouths cold gonzalo king prince prayers lets assist case sebastian patience antonio merely cheated lives drunkards widechoppd rascalwould thou mightst lie drowning washing ten tides gonzalo hell hangd yet though every drop water swear gape widst glut confused noise within mercy us split split farewell wife children farewell brother split split split antonio lets sink wi th king sebastian lets take leave exeunt antonio sebastian gonzalo would give thousand furlongs sea acre barren groundlong heath brown furze thing wills done would fain die dry death exeunt
island prosperos cell
enter prospero miranda
miranda art dearest father put wild waters roar allay sky seems would pour stinking pitch sea mounting th welkins cheek dashes fire suffered saw suffer brave vessel doubt noble creature dashd pieces cry knock heart poor souls perishd god power would sunk sea within earth ere good ship swallowd fraughting souls within prospero conected amazement tell piteous heart theres harm done miranda woe day prospero harm done nothing care thee thee dear one thee daughter art ignorant thou art nought knowing whence better prospero master full poor cell thy greater father miranda know never meddle thoughts prospero tis time inform thee farther lend thy hand pluck magic garment lays mantle lie art wipe thou thine eyes comfort direful spectacle wreck touchd virtue compassion thee provision mine art safely ordered soul much perdition hair betid creature vessel thou heardst cry thou sawst sink sit thou must know farther miranda often begun tell stoppd left bootless inquisition concluding stay yet prospero hours come minute bids thee ope thine ear obey attentive canst thou remember time came unto cell think thou canst thou wast three years old miranda certainly sir prospero house person thing image tell hath kept thy remembrance miranda tis far rather like dream assurance remembrance warrants four five women tended prospero thou hadst miranda lives thy mind seest thou else dark backward abysm time thou remembrest aught ere thou camst thou camst thou mayst miranda prospero twelve year since miranda twelve year since thy father duke milan prince power miranda sir father prospero thy mother piece virtue said thou wast daughter thy father duke milan heir princess worse issued miranda heavens foul play came thence blessed wast prospero girl foul play thou sayst heavd thence blessedly holp hither miranda heart bleeds think th teen turnd remembrance please farther prospero brother thy uncle calld antonio pray thee mark brother perfidious next thyself world lovd put manage state time signories first prospero prime duke reputed dignity liberal arts without parallel study government cast upon brother state grew stranger transported rapt secret studies thy false uncle dost thou attend miranda sir heedfully prospero perfected grant suits deny advance trash overtopping new created creatures mine say changd em else new formd em key officer office set hearts th state tune pleasd ear ivy hid princely trunk suckd verdure ont thou attendst miranda good sir prospero pray thee mark thus neglecting worldly ends dedicated closeness bettering mind retird oerprizd popular rate false brother awakd evil nature trust like good parent beget falsehood contrary great trust indeed limit confidence sans bound thus lorded revenue yielded power might else exact like one truth telling made sinner memory credit liehe believe indeed duke th substitution executing th outward face royalty prerogative hence ambition growing dost thou hear miranda tale sir would cure deafness prospero screen part playd playd needs absolute milan poor manmy library dukedom large enoughof temporal royalties thinks incapable confederates dry sway wi th king naples give annual tribute homage subject coronet crown bend dukedom yet unbowdalas poor milan ignoble stooping miranda heavens prospero mark condition th event tell might brother miranda sin think nobly grandmother good wombs borne bad sons prospero condition king naples enemy inveterate hearkens brothers suit lieu th premises homage know much tribute presently extirpate mine dukedom confer fair milan honours brother whereon treacherous army levied one midnight fated th purpose antonio open gates milan th dead darkness ministers th purpose hurried thence thy crying self miranda alack pity remembring cried cry oer hint wrings mine eyes tot prospero hear little ill bring thee present busines nows upon without story impertinent miranda wherefore hour destroy us prospero well demanded wench tale provokes question dear durst dear love people bore set mark bloody business colours fairer painted foul ends hurried us aboard bark bore us leagues sea prepared rotten carcass butt riggd tackle sail mast rats instinctively quit hoist us cry th sea roard us sigh th winds whose pity sighing back us loving wrong miranda alack trouble prospero cherubin thou wast preserve thou didst smile infused fortitude heaven deckd sea drops full salt burden groand raisd undergoing stomach bear ensue miranda came ashore prospero providence divine food fresh water noble neapolitan gonzalo charity appointed master design give us rich garments linens stuffs necessaries since steaded much gentleness knowing lovd books furnishd mine library volumes prize dukedom miranda would might ever see man prospero arise puts mantle sit still hear last seasorrow island arrivd thy schoolmaster made thee profit princess time vainer hours tutors careful miranda heavens thank fort pray sir still tis beating mind reason raising seastorm prospero know thus far forth accident strange bountiful fortune dear lady hath mine enemies brought shore prescience find zenith doth depend upon auspicious star whose influence court omit fortunes ever droop cease questions thou art inclind sleep tis good dullness give way know thou canst choose miranda sleeps come away servant come ready approach ariel come
ariel hail great master grave sir hail come answer thy best pleasure bet fly swim dive fire ride curld clouds thy strong bidding task ariel quality prospero hast thou spirit performd point tempest bade thee ariel every article boarded kings ship beak waist deck every cabin flamd amazement sometime id divide burn many places topmast yards bowsprit would flame distinctly meet join joves lightning constant coil would infect reason ariel soul felt fever mad playd tricks desperation mariners plungd foaming brine quit vessel afire kings son ferdinand hair upstaringthen like reeds hair first man leapt cried hell empty devils prospero thats spirit nigh shore ariel close master prospero ariel safe ariel hair perishd sustaining garments blemish fresher thou badst troops dispersd bout isle kings son landed left cooling air sighs odd angle isle sitting arms sad knot prospero kings ship mariners say thou hast disposd rest th fleet ariel safely harbour kings ship deep nook thou calldst midnight fetch dew stillvexd bermoothes shes hid mariners hatches stowed charm joind suffred labour left asleep rest th fleet dispersd met upon mediterranean flote bound sadly home naples supposing saw kings ship wreckd great person perish prospero ariel thy charge exactly performd theres work time th day ariel past mid season prospero least two glasses time twixt six must us spent preciously ariel toil since thou dost give pains let remember thee thou hast promisd yet performd prospero moody ist thou canst demand ariel liberty prospero time ariel prithee remember done thee worthy service told thee lies made thee mistakings servd without grudge grumblings thou didst promise bate full year prospero dost thou forget torment free thee ariel prospero thou dost thinkst much tread ooze salt deep run upon sharp wind north business veins th earth bakd frost ariel sir prospero thou liest malignant thing hast thou forgot foul witch sycorax age envy grown hoop hast thou forgot ariel sir prospero thou hast born speak tell ariel sir argier prospero must month recount thou hast thou forgetst damnd witch sycorax mischiefs manifold sorceries terrible enter human hearing argier thou knowst banishd one thing would take life true ariel ay sir prospero blueeyd hag hither brought child left thsailors thou slave thou reportst thyself wast servant thou wast spirit delicate act earthy abhorrd commands refusing grand hests confine thee help potent ministers unmitigable rage cloven pine within rift imprisond thou didst painfully remain dozen years within space died left thee thou didst vent thy groans fast millwheels strike island save son litter freckld whelp hagbornnot honourd human shape ariel yes caliban son prospero dull thing say caliban keep service thou best knowst torment find thee thy groans make wolves howl penetrate breasts everangry bears torment lay upon damnd sycorax could undo mine art arrivd heard thee made gape pine let thee ariel thank thee master prospero thou murmurst rend oak peg thee knotty entrails till thou hast howld away twelve winters ariel pardon master correspondent command spriting gently prospero two days discharge thee ariel thats noble master shall say shall prospero go make thyself like nymph th sea subject sight thine mine invisible every eyeball else go take shape hither come go hence diligence exit ariel awake dear heart awake thou hast slept well awake miranda strangeness story put heaviness prospero shake come well visit caliban slave never yields us kind answer miranda tis villain sir love look prospero tis miss make fire fetch wood serves offices profit us ho slave caliban thou earth thou speak caliban within theres wood enough within prospero come forth say theres business thee come thou tortoise

grief entertaind thats offerd comes th entertainer sebastian dollar gonzalo dolour comes indeed spoken truer purposd sebastian taken wiselier meant gonzalo therefore lord antonio fie spendthrift tongue alonso prithee spare gonzalo well done yet sebastian talking antonio adrian good wager first begins crow sebastian old cock antonio cockrel sebastian done wager antonio laughter sebastian match adrian though island seem desert antonio ha ha ha sebastian youre paid adrian uninhabitable almost inaccessible sebastian yet adrian yet antonio could misst adrian must needs subtle tender delicate temperance antonio temperance delicate wench sebastian ay subtle learnedly deliverd adrian air breathes upon us sweetly sebastian lungs rotten ones antonio twere perfumd fen gonzalo everything advantageous life antonio true save means live sebastian theres none little gonzalo lush lusty grass looks green antonio ground indeed tawny sebastian eye green int antonio misses much sebastian doth mistake truth totally gonzalo rarity indeed almost beyond credit sebastian many vouchd rarities gonzalo garments drenchd sea hold notwithstanding freshness glosses rather newdyd staind salt water marriage alonso cram words mine ears stomach sense would never married daughter coming thence son lost rate far italy removed neer shall see thou mine heir naples milan strange fish hath made meal thee francisco sir may live saw beat surges ride upon backs trod water whose enmity flung aside breasted surge swoln met bold head bove contentious waves kept oared good arms lusty stroke th shore oer waveworn basis bowed stooping relieve doubt came alive land alonso hes gone sebastian sir may thank great loss would bless europe daughter rather lose african least banishd eye hath cause wet grief faults alonso dearst th loss gonzalo lord sebastian truth speak doth lack gentleness time speak rub sore bring plaster sebastian well antonio chirurgeonly gonzalo foul weather us good sir cloudy sebastian foul weather antonio foul gonzalo plantation isle lord antonio hed sow nettleseed sebastian docks mallows gonzalo king ont would sebastian scape drunk want wine gonzalo th commonwealth would contraries execute things kind traffic would admit name magistrate letters known riches poverty use service none contract succession bourn bound land tilth vineyard none use metal corn wine oil occupation men idle women innocent pure sovereignty sebastian yet would king ont antonio latter end commonwealth forgets beginning gonzalo things common nature produce without sweat endeavour treason perfection govern sir excel golden age sebastian save majesty antonio long live gonzalo gonzalo anddo mark sir alonso prithee thou dost talk nothing gonzalo well believe highness minister occasion gentlemen sensible nimble lungs always use laugh nothing antonio twas laughd gonzalo kind merry fooling nothing may continue laugh nothing still antonio blow given sebastian falln flatlong gonzalo speak sebastian surely sleepy language thou speakst thy sleep thou didst say strange repose asleep eyes wide open standing speaking moving yet fast asleep antonio noble sebastian thou letst thy fortune sleepdie rather winkst whiles thou art waking sebastian thou dost snore distinctly theres meaning thy snores antonio serious custom must heed trebles thee oer sebastian well standing water antonio ill teach flow sebastian ebb hereditary sloth instructs antonio knew purpose cherish whiles thus mock stripping invest ebbing men indeed often near bottom run fear sloth sebastian prithee say setting thine eye cheek proclaim matter thee birth indeed throes thee much yield antonio thus sir although lord weak remembrance shall little memory earthd hath almost persuaded hes spirit persuasion prospero austerely punishd compensation makes amends given third mine life live tender thy hand thy vexations trials thy love thou hast strangely stood test afore heaven ratify rich gift ferdinand smile boast thou shalt find outstrip praise make halt behind ferdinand believe oracle prospero gift thine acquisition worthily purchasd take daughter thou dost break virginknot sanctimonious ceremonies may full holy rite ministred sweet aspersion shall heavens let fall make contract grow barren hate soureyd disdain discord shall bestrew union bed weeds loathly shall hate therefore take heed hymens lamps shall light ferdinand hope quiet days fair issue long life love tis murkiest den opportune place strongst suggestion worser genius shall never melt mine honour lust take away edge days celebration shall think phoebus steeds founderd night kept chaind prospero fairly spoke sit talk thine ariel industrious servant ariel
ariel would potent master prospero thou thy meaner fellows last service worthily perform must use another trick go bring rabble oer give thee powr place incite quick motion must bestow upon eyes young couple vanity mine art promise expect ariel presently prospero ay twink ariel say come go breathe twice cry one tripping toe mop mow love master prospero dearly delicate ariel approach till thou dost hear call ariel well conceive exit prospero look thou true give dalliance much rein strongest oaths straw th fire th blood abstemious else good night vow ferdinand warrant sir white cold virgin snow upon heart abates ardour liver prospero well come ariel bring corollary rather want spirit appear pertly tongue eyes silent soft music
iris ceres bounteous lady thy rich leas wheat rye barley vetches oats pease thy turfy mountains live nibbling sheep flat meads thatchd stover keep thy banks pioned twilled brims spongy april thy hest betrims make cold nymphs chaste crowns thy broom groves whose shadow dismissed bachelor loves lasslorn thy poleclipt vineyard thy seamarge sterile rocky hard thou thyself dost airthe queen th sky whose watry arch messenger bids thee leave sovereign grace grassplot place come sport peacocks fly amain juno descends car approach rich ceres entertain

enter senator papers hand

enter flavius timons steward many bills hand

man plague plague apemantus directed hither men report thou dost affect manners dost use timon tis thou dost keep dog would imitate consumption catch thee apemantus thee nature infected poor unmanly melancholy sprung change fortune spade place slavelike habit looks care thy flatterers yet wear silk drink wine lie soft hug diseasd perfumes forgot ever timon shame woods putting cunning carper thou flatterer seek thrive undone thee hinge thy knee let breath thoult observe blow thy cap praise vicious strain call excellent thou wast told thus thou gavst thine ears like tapsters bade welcome knaves approachers tis thou turn rascal hadst thou wealth rascals havet assume likeness timon like thee id throw away apemantus thou hast cast away thyself like thyself madman long fool thinkst bleak air thy boisterous chamberlain put thy shirt warm moist trees outlivd eagle page thy heels skip thou pointst cold brook candied ice caudle thy morning taste cure thy oernights surfeit call creatures whose naked natures live spite wreakful heaven whose bare unhoused trunks conflicting elements exposd answer mere nature bid flatter thee thou shalt find timon fool thee depart apemantus love thee better eer timon hate thee worse apemantus timon thou flatterst misery apemantus flatter say thou art caitiff timon dost thou seek apemantus vex thee timon always villains office fools dost please thyself int apemantus ay timon knave apemantus thou didst put sourcold habit castigate thy pride twere well thou dost enforcedly thoudst courtier wert thou beggar willing misery outlives incertain pomp crownd one filling still never complete high wish best state contentless hath distracted wretched worse worst content thou shouldst desire die miserable timon breath miserable thou art slave fortunes tender arm favour never claspd bred dog hadst thou like us first swath proceeded sweet degrees brief world affords may passive drugs freely command thou wouldst plungd thyself general riot melted thy youth different beds lust never learnd icy precepts respect followed sugred game thee world confectionary mouths tongues eyes hearts men duty could frame employment numberless upon stuck leaves oak one winters brush fell boughs left open bare every storm blows bear never knew better burden thy nature commence sufferance time hath made thee hard int shouldst thou hate men never flatterd thee hast thou given thou wilt curse thy father poor rag must thy subject spite put stuff shebeggar compounded thee poor rogue hereditary hence gone thou hadst born worst men thou hadst knave flatterer apemantus art thou proud yet timon ay thee apemantus prodigal timon one wealth shut thee id give thee leave hang get thee gone whole life athens thus would eat eating root apemantus mend thy feast offering food timon first mend company take away thyself apemantus shall mend mine th lack thine timon tis well mended botchd would apemantus wouldst thou athens timon thee thither whirlwind thou wilt tell gold look apemantus use gold timon best truest sleeps hired harm apemantus liest nights timon timon thats feedst thou days apemantus apemantus stomach finds meat rather eat timon would poison obedient knew mind apemantus wouldst thou send timon sauce thy dishes apemantus middle humanity thou never knewest extremity ends thou wast thy gilt thy perfume mockd thee much curiosity thy rags thou knowst none art despisd contrary theres medlar thee eat timon hate feed apemantus dost hate medlar timon ay though look like thee apemantus th hadst hated medlars sooner thou shouldst loved thyself better man didst thou ever know unthrift beloved means timon without means thou talkst didst thou ever know belovd apemantus timon understand thee thou hadst means keep dog apemantus things world canst thou nearest compare thy flatterers timon women nearest men men things wouldst thou world apemantus lay thy power apemantus give beasts rid men timon wouldst thou thyself fall confusion men remain beast beasts apemantus ay timon timon beastly ambition gods grant thee attain thou wert lion fox would beguile thee thou wert lamb fox would eat thee thou wert fox lion would suspect thee peradventure thou wert accusd ass thou wert ass thy dulness would torment thee still thou livdst breakfast wolf thou wert wolf thy greediness would afflict thee oft thou shouldst hazard thy life thy dinner wert thou unicorn pride wrath would confound thee make thine self conquest thy fury wert thou bear thou wouldst killd horse wert thou horse thou wouldst seizd leopard wert thou leopard thou wert german lion spots thy kindred jurors thy life thy safety remotion thy defence absence beast couldst thou subject beast beast art thou already seest thy loss transformation apemantus thou couldst please speaking thou mightst hit upon commonwealth athens become forest beasts timon ass broke wall thou art city apemantus yonder comes poet painter plague company light upon thee fear catch give way know else ill see thee timon nothing living thee thou shalt welcome rather beggars dog apemantus apemantus thou art cap fools alive timon would thou wert clean enough spit upon apemantus plague thee thou art bad curse timon villains stand thee pure apemantus leprosy thou speakst timon name thee ill beat thee infect hands apemantus would tongue could rot timon away thou issue mangy dog choler kill thou art alive swoon see thee apemantus would thou wouldst burst timon away thou tedious rogue sorry shall lose stone thee throws stone apemantus beast timon slave apemantus toad timon rogue rogue rogue sick false world love nought even mere necessities upont timon presently prepare thy grave lie light foam sea may beat thy gravestone daily make thine epitaph death others lives may laugh looks gold thou sweet kingkiller dear divorce twixt natural son sire thou bright defiler hymens purest bed thou valiant mars thou ever young fresh lovd delicate wooer whose blush doth thaw consecrated snow lies dians lap thou visible god soldrest close impossibilities makst kiss speakst every tongue every purpose thou touch hearts think thy slave man rebels thy virtue set confounding odds beasts may world empire apemantus would twere till dead ill say th hast gold thou wilt throngd shortly timon throngd apemantus ay timon thy back prithee apemantus live love thy misery timon long live die exit apemantus quit things like men eat timon abhor

face surely man born woman forgive general exceptless rashness perpetualsober gods proclaim one honest man mistake one pray hes steward fain would hated mankind thou redeemst thyself save thee fell curses methinks thou art honest wise oppressing betraying thou mightst sooner got another service many arrive second masters upon first lords neck tell true must ever doubt though neer sure thy kindness subtle covetous usuring kindness rich men deal gifts expecting return twenty one flavius worthy master whose breast doubt suspect alas placd late feard false times feast suspect still comes estate least show heaven knows merely love duty zeal unmatched mind care food living believe honourd lord benefit points either hope present id exchange one wish power wealth requite making rich timon look thee tis thou singly honest man take gods misery sent thee treasure go live rich happy thus conditiond thou shalt build men hate curse show charity none let famishd flesh slide bone ere thou relieve beggar give dogs thou deniest men let prisons swallow em debts wither em nothing men like blasted woods may diseases lick false bloods farewell thrive flavius let stay comfort master timon thou hatst curses stay fly whilst thou art blest free neer see thou man let neer see thee exeunt severally

enter aaron alone bag gold

tamora lovely aaron wherefore lookst thou sad everything make gleeful boast birds chant melody every bush snakes lie rolled cheerful sun green leaves quiver cooling wind make chequerd shadow ground sweet shade aaron let us sit babbling echo mocks hounds replying shrilly welltund horns double hunt heard let us sit mark yellowing noise conflict supposd wandring prince dido enjoyed happy storm surprisd curtaind counselkeeping cave may wreathed others arms pastimes done possess golden slumber whiles hounds horns sweet melodious birds unto us nurses song lullaby bring babe asleep aaron madam though venus govern desires saturn dominator mine signifies deadlystanding eye silence cloudy melancholy fleece woolly hair uncurls even adder doth unroll fatal execution madam venereal signs vengeance heart death hand blood revenge hammering head hark tamora empress soul never hopes heaven rests thee day doom bassianus philomel must lose tongue today thy sons make pillage chastity wash hands bassianus blood seest thou letter take pray thee give king fatalplotted scroll question espied comes parcel hopeful booty dreads yet lives destruction
tamora ah sweet moor sweeter life aaron great empress bassianus comes cross ill go fetch thy sons back thy quarrels whatsoeer exit bassianus romes royal emperess unfurnishd wellbeseeming troop dian habited like hath abandoned holy groves see general hunting forest tamora saucy controller private steps powr say dian thy temples planted presently horns actaeons hounds drive upon thy newtransformed limbs unmannerly intruder thou art lavinia patience gentle emperess tis thought goodly gift horning doubted moor singled forth try thy experiments jove shield husband hounds today tis pity take stag bassianus believe queen swarth cimmerian doth make honour bodys hue spotted detested abominable sequestred train dismounted snowwhite goodly steed wandred hither obscure plot accompanied barbarous moor foul desire conducted lavinia intercepted sport great reason noble lord rated sauciness pray let us hence let joy ravencoloured love valley fits purpose passing well bassianus king brother shall notice lavinia ay slips made noted long good king mightily abused tamora patience endure
demetrius dear sovereign gracious mother doth highness look pale wan tamora reason think look pale two ticed hither place barren detested vale see trees though summer yet forlorn lean overcome moss baleful mistletoe never shines sun nothing breeds unless nightly owl fatal raven showd abhorred pit told dead time night thousand fiends thousand hissing snakes ten thousand swelling toads many urchins would make fearful confused cries mortal body hearing straight fall mad else die suddenly sooner told hellish tale straight told would bind unto body dismal yew leave miserable death calld foul adulteress lascivious goth bitterest terms ever ear hear effect wondrous fortune come vengeance executed revenge love mothers life ye henceforth calld children demetrius witness thy son stabs bassianus chiron struck home show strength also stabs lavinia ay come semiramis nay barbarous tamora name fits thy nature thy tamora give poniard shall know boys mothers hand shall right mothers wrong husband secret hole make dead trunk pillow lust tamora ye honey desire let wasp outlive us sting chiron warrant madam make sure come mistress perforce enjoy nicepreserved honesty lavinia tamora thou bearest womans face tamora hear speak away lavinia sweet lords entreat hear word demetrius listen fair madam let glory see tears heart unrelenting flint drops rain lavinia tigers young ones teach dam learn wrath taught thee milk thou suckdst turn marble even thy teat thou hadst thy tyranny yet every mother breeds sons alike chiron thou entreat show womans pity chiron wouldst thou prove bastard lavinia tis true raven doth hatch lark yet heard could find lion movd pity endure princely paws pard away say ravens foster forlorn children whilst birds famish nests though thy hard heart say nothing kind something pitiful tamora know means away lavinia let teach thee fathers sake gave thee life well might slain thee obdurate open thy deaf ears tamora hadst thou person neer offended even sake pitiless remember boys pourd forth tears vain save brother sacrifice fierce andronicus would relent therefore away use worse better lovd lavinia tamora calld gentle queen thine hands kill place tis life beggd long poor slain bassianus died tamora begst thou fond woman let go lavinia tis present death beg one thing womanhood denies tongue tell keep worse killing lust tumble loathsome pit never scene iv another part forest
enter empress sons demetrius chiron lavinia hands cut tongue cut ravishd

marcus niece flies away fast cousin word husband dream would wealth would wake wake planet strike may slumber eternal sleep speak gentle niece stern ungentle hands hath loppd hewd made thy body bare two branches sweet ornaments whose circling shadows kings sought sleep might gain great happiness half thy love dost speak alas crimson river warm blood like bubbling fountain stirrd wind doth rise fall thy rosed lips coming going thy honey breath sure tereus hath deflowered thee lest thou shouldst detect cut thy tongue ah thou turnst away thy face shame notwithstanding loss blood conduit three issuing spouts yet thy cheeks look red titans face blushing encountred cloud shall speak thee shall say tis knew thy heart knew beast might rail ease mind sorrow concealed like oven stoppd doth burn heart cinders fair philomel lost tongue tedious sampler sewd mind lovely niece mean cut thee craftier tereus cousin hast thou met hath cut pretty fingers could better sewd philomel monster seen lily hands tremble like aspen leaves upon lute make silken strings delight kiss would touchd life heard heavenly harmony sweet tongue hath made would droppd knife fell asleep cerberus thracian poets feet come let us go make thy father blind sight blind fathers eye one hours storm drown fragrant meads whole months tears thy fathers eyes draw back mourn thee could mourning case thy misery exeunt

enter aaron moor
aaron titus andronicus lord emperor sends thee word thou love thy sons let marcus lucius thyself old titus one chop hand send king send thee hither thy sons alive shall ransom fault titus gracious emperor gentle aaron ever raven sing like lark gives sweet tidings suns uprise heart ill send emperor hand good aaron wilt thou help chop lucius stay father noble hand thine hath thrown many enemies shall sent hand serve turn youth better spare blood therefore mine shall save brothers lives marcus hands hath defended rome reard aloft bloody battleaxe writing destruction enemys castle none high desert hand hath idle let serve ransom two nephews death kept worthy end aaron nay come agree whose hand shall go along fear die pardon come marcus hand shall go lucius heaven shall go titus sirs strive withred herbs meet plucking therefore mine lucius sweet father shall thought thy son let redeem brothers death marcus fathers sake mothers care let show brothers love thee titus agree spare hand lucius ill go fetch axe marcus use axe exeunt lucius marcus titus come hither aaron ill deceive lend thy hand give thee mine aaron aside calld deceit honest never whilst live deceive men ill deceive another sort youll say ere half hour pass cuts titus hand

saturninus lords wrongs ever seen emperor rome thus overborne troubled confronted thus extent egal justice usd contempt lords know know mightful gods however disturbers peace buzz peoples ears nought hath passd even law wilful sons old andronicus sorrows overwhelmd wits shall thus afflicted wreaks fits frenzy bitterness writes heaven redress see heres jove mercury apollo god war sweet scrolls fly streets rome whats libelling senate blazoning unjustice every goodly humour lords would say rome justice live feigned ecstasies shall shelter outrages shall know justice lives saturninus health sleep hell awake fury shall cut proudst conspirator lives tamora gracious lord lovely saturnine lord life commander thoughts calm thee bear faults titus age th effects sorrow valiant sons whose loss hath piercd deep scarrd heart rather comfort distressed plight prosecute meanest best contempts aside thus shall become highwitted tamora gloze titus touchd thee quick thy lifeblood aaron wise safe anchor port
good fellow wouldst thou speak us clown yes forsooth mistriship emperial tamora empress yonder sits emperor clown tis god saint stephen give godden brought letter couple pigeons saturninus reads letter saturninus go take away hang presently clown much money must tamora come sirrah must hangd clown hangd byr lady brought neck fair end exit guarded saturninus despiteful intolerable wrongs shall endure monstrous villainy know whence device proceeds may borne traitorous sons died law murder brother means butchered wrongfully go drag villain hither hair age honour shall shape privilege proud mock ill thy slaughterman sly frantic wretch holpst make great hope thyself govern rome

act v scene plains near rome
enter lucius army goths drums colours
lucius approved warriors faithful friends received letters great rome signifies hate bear emperor desirous sight therefore great lords titles witness imperious impatient wrongs wherein rome hath done scath let make treble satisfaction first goth brave slip sprung great andronicus whose name terror comfort whose high exploits honourable deeds ingrateful rome requites foul contempt bold us well follow thou leadst like stinging bees hottest summers day led master flowred fields avengd cursed tamora goths saith say lucius humbly thank thank comes led lusty goth
enter goth leading aaron child arms
second goth renowned lucius troops strayd gaze upon ruinous monastery earnestly fix mine eye upon wasted building suddenly heard child cry underneath wall made unto noise soon heard crying babe controlld discourse peace tawny slave half half thy dam thy hue bewray whose brat thou art nature lent thee thy mothers look villain thou mightst emperor bull cow milkwhite never beget coalblack calf peace villain peace even thus rates babe must bear thee trusty goth knows thou art empress babe hold thee dearly thy mothers sake weapon drawn rushd upon surprisd suddenly brought hither use think deeds complots mischief treason villainies ruthful hear yet piteously performd shall buried death unless thou swear child shall live lucius tell thy mind say thy child shall live aaron swear shall careful observe therefore urge thy oath know idiot holds bauble god keeps oath god swears ill urge therefore thou shalt vow god god soeer thou adorest hast reverence save boy nourish bring else act scene 2 troy street
enter cressida man alexander

act scene 3 grecian camp agamemnons tent
agamemnon princes grief hath set jaundies oer cheeks ample proposition hope makes designs begun earth fails promisd largeness checks disasters grow veins actions highest reard knots conflux meeting sap infects sound pine diverts grain tortive errant course growth princes matter new us come short suppose far seven years siege yet troy walls stand sith every action hath gone whereof record trial rich virtue unmingled nestor due observance thy godlike seat great agamemnon nestor shall apply thy latest words reproof chance lies true proof men sea smooth many shallow bauble boats dare sail upon weak untimberd sides even corivalld greatness either harbour fled made toast neptune even doth valours show valours worth divide storms fortune ray brightness herd hath annoyance breeze tiger act ii scene 1 grecian camp
enter ajax thersites
ajax thersites thersites agamemnonhow boils full generally ajax thersites thersites boils runsay general run botchy core ajax dog thersites would come matter see none ajax thou bitchwolfs son canst thou hear feel strikes thersites plague greece upon thee thou mongrel beefwitted lord ajax speak thou whinidst leaven speak beat thee handsomeness thersites shall sooner rail thee wit holiness think thy horse sooner con oration thou learn prayer without book thou canst strike canst thou red murrain thy jades tricks ajax toadstool learn proclamation thersites dost thou think sense thou strikest thus ajax proclamation thersites thou art proclaimd fool think ajax porpentine fingers itch thersites would thou didst itch head foot scratching thee would make thee loathsomest scab greece thou art forth incursions thou strikest slow another ajax say proclamation thersites thou grumblest railest every hour achilles thou art full envy greatness cerberus proserpinas beautyay thou barkst ajax mistress thersites thersites thou shouldst strike ajax cobloaf thersites would pun thee shivers fist sailor breaks biscuit ajax whoreson cur strikes thersites ajax thou stool witch thersites ay thou soddenwitted lord thou hast brain mine elbows assinico may tutor thee scurvy valiant ass thou art thrash troyans thou art bought sold among wit like barbarian slave thou use beat begin thy heel tell thou art inches thou thing bowels thou ajax dog thersites scurvy lord ajax cur strikes thersites mars idiot rudeness camel

act ii scene 3 grecian camp tent achilles
thersites thersites lost labyrinth thy fury shall elephant ajax carry thus beats rail worthy satisfaction would otherwise could beat whilst raild sfoot ill learn conjure raise devils ill see issue spiteful execrations theres achilles rare engineer troy taken till two undermine walls stand till fall thou great thunderdarter olympus forget thou art jove king gods mercury lose serpentine craft thy caduceus ye take little little lessthanlittle wit shortarmd ignorance knows abundant scarce circumvention deliver fly spider without drawing massy irons cutting web vengeance whole camp rather neapolitan boneache methinks curse depending war placket said prayers devil envy say amen ho lord achilles
patroclus whos thersites good thersites come rail thersites could remembred gilt counterfeit thou wouldst slippd contemplation matter thyself upon thyself common curse mankind folly ignorance thine great revenue heaven bless thee tutor discipline come near thee let thy blood thy direction till thy death lays thee says thou art fair corse ill sworn sworn upont never shrouded lazars amen wheres achilles patroclus art thou devout wast thou prayer thersites ay heavens hear patroclus amen
achilles whos patroclus thersites lord achilles art thou come cheese digestion hast thou served thyself table many meals come whats agamemnon thersites thy commander achilles tell patroclus whats achilles patroclus thy lord thersites tell pray thee whats thersites thersites thy knower patroclus tell patroclus art thou patroclus thou must tell knowest achilles tell tell thersites ill decline whole question agamemnon commands achilles achilles lord patroclus knower patroclus fool patroclus rascal thersites peace fool done achilles privilegd man proceed thersites thersites agamemnon fool achilles fool thersites fool aforesaid patroclus fool achilles derive come thersites agamemnon fool offer command achilles achilles fool commanded agamemnon thersites fool serve fool patroclus fool positive patroclus fool thersites make demand creator suffices thou art look comes achilles come patroclus ill speak nobody come thersites exit thersites patchery juggling knavery argument whore cuckolda good quarrel draw emulous factions bleed death upon dry serpigo subject war lechery confound exit

word deserves taste thy worst thy tyranny together working thy jealousies fancies weak boys green idle girls nine think done run mad indeed stark mad thy bygone fooleries spices thou betraydst polixenes twas nothing show thee fool inconstant damnable ingrateful wast much thou wouldst poisond good camillos honour kill king poor trespasses monstrous standing whereof reckon casting forth crows thy baby daughter none little though devil would shed water fire ere donet ist directly laid thee death young prince whose honourable thoughts thoughts high one tender cleft heart could conceive gross foolish sire blemishd gracious dam laid thy answer last lords said cry woe queen queen sweetst dearst creatures dead vengeance fort droppd yet first lord higher powrs forbid paulina say shes dead ill sweart word oath prevail go see bring tincture lustre lip eye heat outwardly breath within ill serve would gods thou tyrant repent things heavier thy woes stir therefore betake thee nothing despair antigonus thou art perfect ship hath touchd upon deserts bohemia mariner ay lord fear landed ill time skies look grimly threaten present blusters conscience heavens hand angry frown upon antigonus sacred wills done go get aboard look thy bark ill long call upon thee mariner make best haste go far th land tis like loud weather besides place famous creatures prey keep upont antigonus go thou away ill follow instantly mariner glad heart rid th business exit antigonus come poor babe heard believd spirits th dead may walk thing thy mother appeard last night neer dream like waking comes creature sometimes head one side another never saw vessel like sorrow filld becoming pure white robes like sanctity approach cabin lay thrice bowd gasping begin speech eyes became two spouts fury spent anon break good antigonus since fate thy better disposition hath made thy person throwerout poor babe according thine oath places remote enough bohemia weep leave crying babe counted lost ever perdita prithee callt ungentle business put thee lord thou neer shalt see thy wife paulina shrieks melted air affrighted much time collect thought slumber dreams toys yet yea superstitiously squard believe hermione hath sufferd death apollo would indeed issue king polixenes laid either life death upon earth right father blossom speed thee well laying child lie thy character laying bundle may fortune please breed thee pretty still rest thine storm begins poor wretch thy mothers fault art thus exposd loss may follow weep heart bleeds accursd oath enjoind farewell day frowns thourt like lullaby rough never saw heavens dim day noise hunt within savage clamour well may get aboard chase gone ever exit pursued bear

act v scene sicilia palace leontes
cleomenes sir done enough performd saintlike sorrow fault could make redeemd indeed paid penitence done trespass last heavens done forget evil forgive leontes whilst remember virtues forget blemishes still think wrong much heirless hath made kingdom destroyd sweetst companion eer man bred hopes paulina true true lord one one wedded world took something good make perfect woman killd would unparalleld leontes think killd killd thou strikst sorely say bitter upon thy tongue thought good say seldom cleomenes good lady might spoken thousand things would done time benefit gracd kindness better paulina one would wed dion would pity state remembrance sovereign name consider little dangers highness fail issue may drop upon kingdom devour incertain lookerson holy rejoice former queen well holier royaltys repair present comfort future good bless bed majesty sweet fellow tot paulina none worthy respecting thats gone besides gods fulfilld secret purposes divine apollo said ist tenour scene iii sicilia chapel paulinas house
enter leontes polixenes florizel perdita camillo paulina lords attendants
leontes grave good paulina great comfort thee paulina sovereign sir well meant well services paid home vouchsafd crownd brother contracted heirs kingdoms poor house visit surplus grace never life may last answer leontes paulina honour trouble came see statue queen gallery passd without much content many singularities saw daughter came look upon statue mother paulina livd peerless dead likeness well believe excels whatever yet lookd upon hand man hath done therefore keep lonely apart prepare see life lively mockd ever still sleep mockd death behold say tis well paulina draws curtain discovers hermione standing like statue like silence shows wonder yet speak first liege comes something near leontes natural posture chide dear stone may say indeed thou art hermione rather thou art thy chiding tender infancy grace yet paulina hermione much wrinkled nothing aged seems polixenes much paulina much carvers excellence lets go sixteen years makes livd leontes might done much good comfort piercing soul thus stood even life majesty warm life coldly stands first wood ashamd stone rebuke stone royal piece theres magic thy majesty evils conjurd remembrance thy admiring daughter took spirits standing like stone thee perdita give leave say tis superstition kneel implore blessing lady dear queen ended began give hand kiss paulina patience statue newly fixd colours dry camillo lord sorrow sore laid sixteen winters blow away many summers dry scarce joy ever long live sorrow killd much sooner polixenes dear brother let cause powr take much grief piece paulina indeed lord thought sight poor image would thus wrought stone mine id showd leontes draw curtain paulina longer shall gaze ont lest fancy may think anon moves leontes let let would dead methinks already make see lord would deem breathd veins verily bear blood polixenes masterly done life seems warm upon lip leontes fixture eye motion int mockd art paulina ill draw curtain lords almost far transported hell think anon lives leontes sweet paulina make think twenty years together settled senses world match pleasure madness let alone paulina sorry sir thus far stirrd could afflict farther leontes paulina affliction taste sweet cordial comfort still methinks air comes fine chisel could ever yet cut breath let man mock kiss paulina good lord forbear ruddiness upon lip wet youll mar kiss stain oily painting shall draw curtain leontes twenty years perdita long could stand lookeron paulina either forbear quit presently chapel resolve amazement behold ill make statue move indeed descend take hand youll think protest assisted wicked powers leontes make content look speak content hear tis easy make speak move paulina requird awake faith stand still think unlawful business let depart leontes proceed foot shall stir paulina music awake strike music tis time descend stone approach strike look upon marvel come ill fill grave stir nay come away bequeath death numbness dear life redeems perceive stirs hermione comes pedestal start actions shall holy hear spell lawful shun see die kill double nay present hand young wood age become suitor leontes shes warm magic let art lawful eating polixenes embraces camillo hangs neck pertain life let speak polixenes ay make manifest livd stoln dead paulina living told hooted like old tale appears lives though yet speak mark little please interpose fair madam kneel pray mothers blessing turn good lady perdita found hermione gods look sacred vials pour graces upon daughters head tell mine hast thou preservd livd found thy fathers court thou shalt hear knowing paulina oracle gave hope thou wast preservd see issue paulina theres time enough lest desire upon push trouble joys like relation go together precious winners exultation partake every one old turtle wing witherd bough mate thats never found lament till lost leontes peace paulina thou shouldst husband take consent thine wife match made betweens vows thou hast found mine questiond saw thought dead vain said many prayer upon grave ill seek far partly know mind find thee honourable husband come camillo take hand whose worth honesty richly noted justified us pair kings lets place look upon brother pardons eer put holy looks ill suspicion soninlaw son unto king heavens directing trothplight daughter good paulina lead us hence may leisurely one demand answer part performd wide gap time since first disseverd hastily lead away exeunt
end

sometimes levelled eyes carriage ride battry spheres intend sometime diverted poor balls tied th orbed earth sometimes extend view right anon gazes lend every place nowhere fixed mind sight distractedly commixed
hair loose tied formal plat proclaimed careless hand pride untucked descended sheaved hat hanging pale pined cheek beside threaden fillet still bide true bondage would break thence though slackly braided loose negligence
thousand favours maund drew amber crystal beaded jet one one river threw upon whose weeping margent set like usury applying wet wet monarchs hands lets bounty fall want cries excess begs
folded schedules many one perused sighed tore gave flood cracked many ring posied gold bone bidding find sepulchres mud found yet moe letters sadly penned blood sleided silk feat affectedly enswathed sealed curious secrecy
often bathed fluxive eyes often kissed often gan tear cried false blood thou register lies unapproved witness dost thou bear ink would seemed black damned said top rage lines rents big discontents breaking contents

small show man yet upon chin phoenix began appear like unshorn velvet termless skin whose bare outbragged web seemed wear yet showed visage cost dear nice affections wavering stood doubt best best without
qualities beauteous form maidentongued thereof free yet men moved storm oft twixt may april see winds breathe sweet unruly though rudeness authorized youth livery falseness pride truth

quickly side verdict went real habitude gave life grace appertainings ornament accomplished case aids made fairer place came additions yet purposed trim pierced grace graced

yet equals demand desired yielded finding honour forbid safest distance mine honour shielded experience many bulwarks builded proofs newbleeding remained foil false jewel amorous spoil
